PSCT.Base: Your opponent cannot target "Purrely" monsters you control with card effects, the turn they are Special Summoned. Once per turn, if a face-up "Purrely" Xyz Monster(s) you control leaves the field because of an opponent's card: Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Purrely" monster from your Deck or GY. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 "Purrely" Xyz Monster on the field; attach 1 "Purrely" Quick-Play Spell from your Deck or GY to that monster as material.
